patthana8.16:1.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:1.1_1: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:1.1_2: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:2.1_1: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:2.1_2: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:3.1_0: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:3.1_1: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.16:3.1_2: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.16:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
